website_summaries.verdict: 50 billion CFU per 2-capsule serving means you're getting a potent dose of pre- and probiotics on a daily basis.
pros: Made in the USA and certified organic
Targeted release ensures the capsule will survive digestion into the intestinal tract
Glowing reviews of digestive improvement after use
cons: Some complained of intestinal upset when taking the 2-capsule dose

customer_reviews.title: Makes great tasting yogurt
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal . Added to Raw milk and left overnight in a.warm location it produces yougurt. I tested with several other brands , one was even shipped with a cooling pack but they all failed to ferment the milk . Only this brand works and the yogurt produced is tasty .
customer_reviews.author: Mycotoxin

customer_reviews.title: Strong probiotic
customer_reviews.text: The price is great on these, but definitely BEWARE! I do not recommend taking 2 pills in the beginning if you have not taken probiotics in the past! I had been eating very clean for a couple months, but got a sinus infection and was recommended by a nutritionist to take a probiotic to boost gut health since I was on antibiotics. Anyway-taking 2 pulls a day gave me horrible diarrhea, until I figured out they were causing the issue and cut back the pills to one a day! Everything fine since then, will try to build back up to 2 a day...I also take at bedtime just in case there would be any stomach issues!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because I took a pH test of my vagina and found it was about a 4.5 pH level when it should be a 4 or less... Signaling a possible bacterial infection. I have taken these pills for 5 days now and the dark green pH strip has turned to like green... My pH has lowered to a 3.5!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Probiotics ftw!! I have to have these
customer_reviews.text: Literally the best thing you can get for your body! I was having bad stomach problems and it vanished after two days of taking these regularly. Keep in mind that if you are putting junk into your body, you need good bacteria in your gut. It's crucial, roughly 80% of your immune system originates from your digestive tract. This WILL help you get your health back in order.
customer_reviews.author: Arjit Purohit

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t know there was much of a difference between probiotics until I did some research. After realizing the ones I had been getting were probably not doing anything for me, I wanted to invest in a better option. This brand checked all the boxes and was still really affordable! I’ve been taking them for about a week now and I can tell a difference! The first few days I didn’t feel too great but realized it was because this probiotic was actually doing something for me and rebalancing my gut. Now I feel less bloated and all around healthier. I will definitely be getting more!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Schaaf

customer_reviews.title: Histamine Producing Bacteria
customer_reviews.text: Before buying this, I didn't realize that some strains of bacteria used in probiotics produce histamines. When I discovered this, I looked up which ones do, and all three I discovered are used in this one. If you're sensitive to histamines or have leaky gut (which makes you sensitive to histamines), then this is not for you. According to an article on bullet proof, an overload of histamines "leads to increased inflammation and many other symptoms including: skin irritation, hives, throat tightening, increased heart rate, nasal congestion, migraines, fatigue, heartburn, reflux, and weight gain." I'm sure this can work for some people, but probably only despite the histamine-producing bacteria.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for gut and acne!
customer_reviews.text: After I took 10 day antibiotic course (which I regret so much, always try to find an alternative to antibiotics) my clear skin broke out sooo badly, even in places that I've never had acne before and on my back too. After some research I've concluded that my gut was messed up so I've ordered this probiotic. And it helped! I don't have active acne on my skin, only the scaring and no more painful cysts! And also as you can see from the photos it passed the milk test A+. I'm on my second bottle and I take one in the morning and one before bed. Definitely give it a try and stay away from antibiotics! Cheers :)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah L.

customer_reviews.title: Scammed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been bamboozled This product contains “pediococcus pentosaceus” in it instead of the advertised “b.bifidum” you should take b.bifidum out of your ingredients list in the photo and in the description

customer_reviews.title: Cystic acne fighter

But when I took the plastic of the lid and opened the bottle the seal was cut out. As if they had refilled it with something else. Since there is no way to tell what is actually supposed to be in the bottle i have to throw away the entire thing.

customer_reviews.title: NewRhythm Works!
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking NewRhythm for about 2 months now. While it will never be a cure for IBS-D, it has certainly helped me by reducing bloating and diarrhea. I was taking a different brand prior to the end of last year and had a setback with my tummy. I had to take Tamiflu as a prophylactic and it destroyed my gut flora plus the probiotic I was taking failed. I tried another brand and it didn’t work at all. I tried NewRhythm and within a week I was doing much better. I will continue as I like the value and it is still working.
customer_reviews.author: Turlene

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding effectiveness.
customer_reviews.text: Husband has been having gut problems for over 20 years. To a point where he has problems standing up straight, all kinds of pain, numbing of arms, swelling of hemorrhoids, and fatigue. Doctors at a loss, nutrition classes helped 30% (has to eat 2-hour boiled veggies, no processed sugars, no alcohol), and tried several probiotic OTC's. But THIS ONE WORKS. Pain down 90%, hemorrhoids "disappeared", feels ten years younger and can even "bend" his diet now and again. Has taken 2 pills per day for 60 days, and is now trying to decrease dosage to see if he can maintain. (Discontinuation was a return to painful status.)

Excellent probiotic UPDATE 4/2018 Best probiotic that I have ever taken. After months of using them, I take two a day, I can say I am regular and feeling good.

I ranned across this product and liked all the good reviews I read. This product was half the price and it had 20 strains. The more strains the better! Because my stomach can be so sensitive, any food can upset it so more strain fighters really helps. You take two so I am still getting the 100 billion CFUs. My digestion is better and my stomach is more balanced than ever. I definitely say give this product a try✅👍🏾😊

These pills smelled terrible straight out of the bottle. After taking one, I kept burping it back up for the rest of the day and it severely upset my stomach. I'm so disappointed as I had such a great experience with the first bottle. Won't be ordering these again.

I would recommend these to anyone who suffers from stomach problems.

I am trying to figure out if I return or send to the USFDA. I reordered my regular brand and my

customer_reviews.text: Sadly they did not worked for me. I have IBS and Constipation problems, and it didn't helped with that. I no longer have my appendix so i need a replacement of the good bacteria in my gut. My diet consists of healthy foods between fish, salads, no grains, no wheat, no dairy foods (except Kefir) i finished the bottle waiting to see any results before giving an honest review. While it may have worked for others, It didn't worked for me. On the contrary i felt worse afterwards, feeling bloated, constipated, discomfort, belly hurt to the touch. I developed insomnia, horrible anxiety/panic attacks(not sure it it's related but i didn't do anything differently except take this supplement).

customer_reviews.title: I've had better bowel movements since using as well
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product sporadically since purchasing it, so my review isn't 100%. Nevertheless, during those times, the product made me very gassy, but with continued use, the gas subsided. Also, I've had better bowel movements since using as well, and less bloating. Prior to usage, I was bloaty, gassy x3, and stayed using miralax/fiber. I think if i used it more often, the results would be better, but the gassy / frequent bm phase with my busy work and school schedule hinders me from doing so.

Dosage is only one, providing a huge number of strains in a relatively small capsule (it's not super tiny, but not huge and hard to swallow as some brands are). We're on our 3rd bottle, it lasts 2 months - we saw quick results in digestion/elimination. Since gut health is supposed to be the place where your immune system resides, I'm going to continue with this product and stop searching for the perfect (is there one?) probiotic. NewRhythm Probiotics 50 Billion CFU 20 Strains is the best so far!

customer_reviews.text: After a full 24 hour period of taking the recommended dosage I started getting sharp right abdominal pain. Did not think much of it. It lasted three more days. My diet didn't change, always eating what I usually do. I stopped taking the product and within two days, the pain was gone. These pills made me sick, caused horrible sharp pain in my stomach and upset stomach. Never had a fever during this time, so I was able to rule out a flu.

customer_reviews.text: So, I'm pretty generous when it comes to leaving reviews but these pills did not work well for my body. I don't have any health concerns, I was just taking them to improve my health. I'm 30 years old, active and eat relatively well. After taking these pills I gained almost 3lbs, my waistline and belly gained half of an inch and my BMs weren't normal anymore. Within a couple of days of stopping these, I lost the weight, my waistline went back down, and my,BMs were back to normal. If you're young and healthy, I don't recommend these.

Either when my stomach acidity jumps too high causing my old duodenum ulcer to act up again and to remind me of the old scars, or when I recently had a case of intestinal pain that went slowly from upper intestines into appendicitis, these probiotics restored my intestinal flora to a healthy one and solved all the symptomatic problems. customer_reviews.text: Feel like I am one of the few bad reviews out here, but have taken probiotics daily for over 10 years. Tried this brand and something in it did NOT agree with me. I have celiac, so wonder if it is actually gluten free because it was a similar reaction to when I accidentally ingest gluten (rash on face, severe stomach pain, etc). Regardless, I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: MarvelousMrsBateman

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been plagued with left side abdominal pain and a burning sensation, had a colonoscopy, CT scan, and only thing found was inflammation of my sigmoid colon and ulcers but never any answers other than different meds to treat the symptoms with not so great side effects. I’ve struggled with it for years. I’ve trued different probiotics, I’ve tried candita cleanses. I’m three days in with this, taking one pill a day in the middle of the day and have 2/3 of my pain gone and no diarrhea in the morning. I’m a believer at this point. My bottle came in perfect shape with a good seal, I didn’t have any problems opening it.
customer_reviews.author: Foo

customer_reviews.title: At least as good as the higher priced PBs I was using.
customer_reviews.text: I was using a product that was very good but 400% more expensive. After 2 years of using the high priced product I went looking for an alternative that was at least as good but much cheaper. I came up with 3 choices. I decided to try NewRhythm Probiotics. So far I have no reason to try anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Mac

customer_reviews.title: I feel like a bought expensive white dust
customer_reviews.text: After taking the pills for about a week and getting suspicious because I didn't feel any different at all (wasn't asking for a lot, maybe a little bit of gas or bloating at least), I did the milk->yogurt test. After 72 hours, the milk ran like water. Major fail. I chose these prebiotics specifically because they were marked as "Amazon's Choice". That usually proves to be a good decision. This time, I was extremely disappointed. I feel like a sucker.
customer_reviews.author: John Chimpo

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me
customer_reviews.text: I have IBS with Constipation and almost every night that I went to bed (prior to trying any probiotics) my stomach would begin to growl and I begin to feel acid indigestion. I tried several brands of probiotics with varying results. When I started taking this probiotic the growling stomach and feeling of acid indigestion went away. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Grabowski

customer_reviews.title: spoiled in my cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Although these capsules are supposed to be good until over a year from now, after they had been in my cabinet for 5 months the white powder inside the capsules discolored and solidified. It turned a yellowish orangish pink and hardened. I open the capsules when I use them for making yogurt, so I know that they were filled with white powder when new, and that the discoloring occurred in May, after having sat in a temperate controlled, not humid cabinet for 5 months.
customer_reviews.author: St. Fern

customer_reviews.title: Cap is horrible
customer_reviews.text: To the vendor......product is decent....your new turn and push down cap is HORRIBLE to the point of not being able to open the product to use the product. This appears to be a recent change. Bad idea. Looking for another product I can actually get too for its intended purpose ....To use! Huh.......What an idea!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Fleming

customer_reviews.title: ... the years and I find this one is the best. Took away my acid reflux too
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several over the years and I find this one is the best. Took away my acid reflux too. If I gave up sugar (candy and soda etc) it would work even better. I have Candida and it keeps it under control fairly well (I take 4 pills per day) even with my poor diet. I will keep using them and order more.
customer_reviews.author: G L Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Causes skin reactions!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product a few months ago and it was working fine at first. Then I started to notice red itchy spots on my skin, I thought they were mosquito bites, so I kept taking the pills. When I realized they were not mosquito bites I stopped taking the pills for a while. I just took a pill again last week and I experienced red itchy spots on my leg and stomach. I will not be able to use these pills anymore and I didn't even finish taking them. I feel like I wasted my money because I can't use them.
customer_reviews.author: Junebug

customer_reviews.title: Vomiting and Diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: I received my bottle yesterday and decided to start off with just one pill instead of the two suggested on the bottle. Nothing else had changed during the day as far as eating and drinking. About 2 hours after taking the probiotics I started feeling sick to my stomach and shortly after that started vomiting. I proceeded to vomit on and off for the next 5 hours and about 3 hours after taking the probiotics the diarrhea started. I'm now 12 hours out, doing better but nowhere near 100%. I've taken other brands of probiotics in the past and have never had a problem. These will be going in my compost pile.
customer_reviews.author: IceHorse

customer_reviews.title: My wife and I are health/nutrition conscious focused on quality ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I are health/nutrition conscious focused on quality food with enhanced supplementation. After internet reasearch on the most effective, complete, and quality probiotics she gave me that criteria and I matched it to your probiotics on Amazon. So far in this aging process it seems that our actions/choices are being validated with excellent health at ages 67 and 68.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive for a probiotic, but expensive for a fiber supplement
customer_reviews.text: Ordering this product was easy, the price was right, and delivery was fast, even without having Amazon Prime. I'm not convinced that this product does anything besides help make you regular, which any fiber supplement can do. I guess i was expecting to feel different/better due to the probiotics, but I don't. I've been taking it faithfully for 2 1/2 weeks. I'm going to finish up the bottle as directed, and will update this review if my final opinion varies from this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Negative
customer_reviews.text: I really don’t think these did anything for me. I have a tortuous colon so I experience chronic constipation and it’s sooooo frustrating! I even took 2 doses of 2 pills per day, pretty big pills, and I didn’t notice anything different. I had high hopes but this product has not changed anything for me at all.
customer_reviews.author: lchapko

customer_reviews.title: Makes great yogurt
customer_reviews.text: I took these orally for a few days, and felt that they are a great addition to my macrobiotic repertoire. I had read that they act as a great starter for yogurt, so into the intant pot they went. I made 12 hour yogurt from a gallon of milk. If these are 50 billion cfu's, the yogurt may be ten or 20 times more since they reproduce in the yogurt so nicely. Tart and creamy, the kids and I enjoyed the yogurt all week. Time for another batch....
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: ... intolerance and insulin resistance and I really needed a good probiotic. I take 2 pills a day and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a gluten intolerance and insulin resistance and I really needed a good probiotic. I take 2 pills a day and everything feels so much better! These probiotics in conjunction with my diet changes have really helped. They're super easy to take. I like that you don't need to refrigerate. I spent a lot of time trying to find a decent high count probiotic and here it is! Since I take 2 pills everyday the bottle lasts me about a month. I'm on my 3rd bottle now and couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have always had problems with upset stomach, abdominal pain, and chronic constipation. I was prescribed linzess for my IBS but I don’t like relying on prescription medication. I been taking this product for a month, i have bowel movements 2-3 times a week and no stomach pain. I’m so happy I found a natural product I can use daily without any side affects
customer_reviews.author: tamika holmes

customer_reviews.title: smells and tastes gross
customer_reviews.text: i’m not even sure how well these worked for me, didn’t notice any drastic changes or anything. the only thing i noticed was how horrible they smell and taste. i literally have to hold my breath from the time i open the container to the time i chase with water like 5 times. i bought these bc they were a good price and they were amazon’s choice. i’ve taken other probiotics before and have never had issue with smell or taste
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Spielman

customer_reviews.title: Good brand, but I can't take it
customer_reviews.text: I take other supplements by this company, no problem. But this one did not agreed with me. I have eliminated other sources to verify this as the cause of my discomfort after taking this probiotic. I contacted the company and asked if they use inulin in the fiber blend, but they stated they do not. My system must be too sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Loislk

customer_reviews.title: By far the best probiotic I've used
customer_reviews.text: This product really works. Don't meant to be graphic but I have a BM every morning. This has taken me to a new level. I feel my food is being digested better, evacuation is complete. I took 4 one day. My stomach had a rumble later..probably too much. For me, 2 capsules is fine. I just bought another bottle. I don't want to be without this. Better than anything in the store that I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Ghostdog

customer_reviews.title: Lots of strains and happy tummies
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my family, to include my dog following his ingestion of stuffie fluff from his toys. I love that it's the most affordable option with this many strains. I have an ulcer and this super helped me with the healing process, and my dog's stomach definitely felt better after passing and healing his gut. Good to have in those times someone in my family has to take an antibiotic too. Restores the good after the antis clear all the good and bad bacteria out. Don't forget to take a probiotic AWAY from your antibiotic or else the anti will kill the pro!
customer_reviews.author: BrittanyTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Best probiotics on amazon
customer_reviews.text: I love these been taking them for two years religiously. And I swear I havent gotten a cold. They're about 16bucks even at two capsules a serving they come out cheaper then the RE NU LIFE 50billion CFU. Which I think is one capsule a day but will run you almost 70 bucks.. And these have 20diffrent strains as compared to the 12 strains in the RE NU LIFE. I'm satisfied 2 capsules a day along with a couple fork fulls of sauerkraut to get even more variety in my system. Trust me new rhythm rocks. I've never been healthier.. I beleive it says you dont have to refrigerate. But I keep mine in the freezer..
customer_reviews.author: william f levi

customer_reviews.title: Hit or miss...1st purchase was grea... 2nd purchase was a waste
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd time I have purchased this item and unlike the first time when I saw a change in my digestive system and my belly bloat this time I have had zero results so maybe I got a bad batch but this really stinks i feel like I wasted money wishing for my results to be somewhat similar to the last time I purchased this item
customer_reviews.author: Marcella

customer_reviews.title: Gut is happy!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my gut and tried it for making homemade soy milk yoghurt. Both is working famously! I alternate taking it with Femdophilus which has great reviews, but does not have the numbers for probiotics as this one. Also, I use 2 capsules opened onto half a quart of warmed soy milk and then incubated for 11 hours, and when cooled refrigerated and it turned out great! I was worrying that I would need more than 2 capsules, or it won't work at all, but did very well. I would definitely buy again, if they do not become adulterated in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Tommi

customer_reviews.title: This brand of Probiotics is GREAT! I have had gastrointestinal issues for years and ...
customer_reviews.text: This brand of Probiotics is GREAT! I have had gastrointestinal issues for years and have been prescribed various medications but none really seem to help! I will continue to use NewRhythm Probiotics! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne S.

customer_reviews.title: Noticeably improving my health!
customer_reviews.text: Love these probiotics. They don’t make me woozy if I miss a meal after taking them. I’ve also noticed that I have been getting sick less often (cold, sinuses, etc.) since I’ve been taking them. I’ve been taking them for about 4 months now and also just feel much better about my digestive health. Those random, annoying digestive issues are also happening less and less! I plan to continue to refill these.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Pineda

customer_reviews.title: Helps to get you back to being regular
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking narcotics for a couple of months now for some severe pain and the most common side effect is constipation. Thanks to these probiotics, I can definitely say I am regular again and feel great about it. It was difficult for me to find a probiotic that has colony forming units (CFU) without being way too expensive. Glad I found this one at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: no thank you
customer_reviews.text: Been taking these for 3 to four months to get my intestinal track in good health. I have went to okay to can't be away from the bathroom for long! Cramping, diarrhea, stomach pains! I thought something was seriously wrong with me so I read the reviews and was like my hell I need to get off of these immediately! Take at your own risk of having a poop-accident!
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I have IBS among other things and was recommended a high dose probiotic with lots of strains by my gastroenterologist and alternative medicine physician. This stuff is great. I really know if I happen to skip a day or two because my symptoms will come back with a vengeance. Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Carmack

customer_reviews.title: Probiotics by New Rhythm
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a good probiotic, I researched before trying. I found the formula I was looking for in NewRhythm. Priced at under $17.00 for a month supply. It has all the ingredients that I found in 1MD's formula has, along with a few extra strains. 1 MD's version is $49.00 for 1 month supply; buy 6 months, gets down to 37.33. I could not see the value in paying way more for the same ingredient list. The formulas are slightly different. But everything in the high priced bottle is contained in the New Rhythm formula.
customer_reviews.author: Gin

customer_reviews.title: With the sale price definitely a great deal
customer_reviews.text: I stopped taking my probiotics and was giving them to my dogs. I started noticing I was having tummy problems again which I do have a hiatel hernia. I take medication s for it but they weren't helping. I realized that the difference was I stopped taking my probiotics. I decided to try this brand. It did not disappoint. No more burning.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Lily Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product daily since Feb 2019. I had serious acid reflux that was serious enough to require hospital visit. I started using this product with turmeric. After 2 weeks I was feeling much better and the only time my acid reflux came back is when I was on vacation and lost my supplements. Took them again when I got home and a few days I was back tot normal. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey B.

customer_reviews.title: Help with regularity
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking these for a month and haven't noticed any bloating or negative side effects. Bowel movements have been like clock work 1-2x a day. Dont let them sit on your tongue too long though because they dont taste that great but it is not a deterrent.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna DeFilippis

customer_reviews.title: Helpful product
customer_reviews.text: Considering all the research about probiotics improving overall health because it keeps your gut healthy, I opted to use this product several months ago. A friend of mine was taking something similar at the advise of her doctor and she noticed a big improvement with stomach issues. I believe these tablets have improved my overall health. My digestive system seems to have improved a great deal, and when I eat healthier, the results are even more noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon A.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work. Terrible stomach ache
customer_reviews.text: It didn't really work for me. I had a terrible stomach ache the first time I had it. I tried taking it again just to make sure the stomach ache was caused by this product. I actually didn't feel any pain the second time I had it, but the terrible stomach ache came back when I had it the third time.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Make a big difference in gut health
customer_reviews.text: Great and effective probiotics! I definitely feel a difference when I take them. I don't have severe gut problems but can feel when I have inflammation and these help tremendously. They are easy to swallow and no weird flavors. I take one in the morning and one at night. I definitely recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Elyse

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great price, good customer service
customer_reviews.text: 50 billion CFU and 20 bacterial strains! Great price and came sealed and packaged as expected. Has worked wonderfully so far keeping my gut health in check. I especially liked that I received emails from the seller before and after the arrival of product to guarantee satisfaction and thanking me for the purchase. I have no doubt that if I had trouble, they’d give excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Shelt M

product_meta.title: NewRhythm Probiotics 50 Billion CFU 20 Strains, 60 Veggie Capsules, Targeted Release Technology, Stomach Acid Resistant, No Need for Refrigeration, Non-GMO, Gluten Free
product_meta.description:
NewRhythm Probiotics 50 Billion CFU is formulated with 20 most human probiotic strains. It's scientifically proven to survive harsh stomach acids and reach your intestinal tract, where they exert their greatest benefits. 
Organic Prebiotic Fiber is designed to aid in the maintenance of probiotic activity in the intestine. This superior probiotic has been professionally formulated, handled and tested to ensure maximum stability and full labeled potency. 
What are the key benefits of NewRhythm? Probiotic 50 Billion CFU? 
¡ô Support For Digestive & Intestinal Health*
¡ô Supports Healthy Immune Function*
¡ô Maintain Intestinal Microflora Balance*
Promotes the Healthy Functioning of the Intestinal System*
Probiotics are live friendly¡± microorganisms similar to those found in the body Taking probiotics can replenish the supply in your intestines of good bacteria, which may become depleted due to poor diet, medication, health concerns and aging.* 

Why choose NewRhythm Probiotics? 
? Delivers 20 different strains and 50 billion colony-forming units (CFUs) of viable probiotics per two-capsule serving
? Survives Stomach Acid and Intestinal Bile
? Targeted Release Technology
Arrive Alive Potency Promise
Includes Prebiotics Fiber
Exceptional quality at a good price
100% Natural
100% Vegetarian
NON-GMO
Gluten Free
Quality, Purity, Potency Guaranteed
Contains NO Milk, Eggs, Fish, Shellfish, Tree nuts, Peanuts, Wheat, Soy, Corn, Gluten, Salt, Sugar, Yeast, Fillers, Magnesium Stearate or Preservatives. 
Made in the USA in an GMP Certified Facility
Tested and Approved Independently by 3rd Party Labs
Note: Please keep it in a cool, dry place.
feature_bullets: ★MADE IN NEW YORK, USA★ NewRhythm 50 Billion Probiotics is made in a Facility Based in New York, USA. Our Facility is GMP Certificated , which Represent the Highest Level of Technology, Quality Purity and Consistence.

50 BILLION 20 STRAINS TARGETED RELEASE FORMULA NewRhythm 50 Billion Probiotics Capsules is Scientifically Backed Proven, Formulated by Doctor with 50 Billion Living Organisms Per Serving, Featuring Targeted Release Technology to Help Probiotics Survive Stomach Acids and Reach Your Intestinal Track. Prebiotics Fiber is also Included In the Formula.

POTENT AND PURE FOR YOUR DIGESTIVE HEALTH AND IMMUNE HEALTH*¡ï Our All Natural Probiotics Provides Support For the Establishment and Maintenance of Favorable Intestinal Flora. Gives You Powerful Support for Healthy Digestion and Balanced Intestinal Ecology. Our Products are Shelf Stable that Does NOT Require Refrigeration

100% NATURAL, NON-GMO, GLUTEN FREE NewRhythm 50 Billion Probiotics is Formulated with 100% Natural Ingredients and Independently Tested in 3rd Party Labs in USA. Our Turmeric Supplement is Verified NON-GMO, Gluten Free and Verified Free of Sugar, Soy, Yeast, Egg, Wheat, Corn, Peanuts, Fish, Shellfish, Magnesium Stearate, Artificial Ingredients, Fillers, Binders, Preservatives.

100% SATISFACTION OR 100% MONEY BACK, GUARANTEED. We stand behind our products with confidence. If in anyway you are not completely satisfied with our products, please let us know in 30 days, we will give you 100% money back.
